Package br.com.kirgh.app.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
br.com.kirgh.app.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
The UserService class creates a new user and saves it to the database, along with a user relation if specified, and returns a success message.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      @Transactional public User createUser(UserDTO userDTO)
      This Java function creates a new user and saves it to the database, along with a user relation if specified, while checking for existing users and owner IDs.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - A data transfer object (DTO) representing a user, containing fields such as name, email, CPF (Brazilian tax ID), and a relation object (if applicable).
      Returns:
      The method is returning a User object.

    • getFilteredUsers

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<User> getFilteredUsers(Map<String,String> filters, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      This function retrieves a filtered list of users based on the provided filters and pagination settings.
      Parameters:
      filters - A map containing the filters to be applied to the query. The keys represent the field names and the values represent the filter values.
      pageable - The pageable parameter is used to specify the pagination settings for the query. It includes information such as the page number, page size, and sorting criteria. It allows you to retrieve a specific page of results from the query.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a Page object containing a list of User entities that match the specified filters and are paginated according to the provided Pageable object.

    • getAllUserInfoById

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public User getAllUserInfoById(UUID id)
      The function retrieves all information of a user by their ID from the user repository.
      Parameters:
      id - The id parameter is of type UUID and represents the unique identifier of the user whose information is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a User object.

    • getAllAddressesBoundUser

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public UserCompleteInfoDTO getAllAddressesBoundUser(UUID id)
      The function retrieves all addresses and related user information for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The id parameter is a UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) that represents the unique identifier of a user.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a UserCompleteInfoDTO object.

    • updateUserInfoById

      @Transactional public User updateUserInfoById(UUID id, UserUpdateDTO userUpdateDTO)
      The function updates a user's information by their ID using the provided UserUpdateDTO object.
      Parameters:
      id - The id parameter is of type UUID and represents the unique identifier of the user whose information needs to be updated.
      userUpdateDTO - The userUpdateDTO parameter is an object of type UserUpdateDTO, which is a data transfer object used to update user information.
      Returns:
      The method is returning an updated User object.

    • deleteUserById

      @Transactional public void deleteUserById(UUID id)
      This function deletes a user and all related data, including addresses and user relations.
      Parameters:
      id - The `id` parameter is a unique identifier (UUID) that represents the user to be deleted.
